data_transformation_default.preamble: Transform data according to specifications. Apply cleaning, normalization, aggregation, and validation rules. Ensure data integrity and provide transformation audit log.

format_conversion_default.preamble: Convert files from source format to target format while preserving data integrity. Handle encoding issues, validate output, and provide conversion report.

translation_default.preamble: Translate content accurately while preserving meaning, context, and tone. Adapt cultural references appropriately. Maintain formatting and technical terminology consistency.

code_transpilation_default.preamble: Transpile code from source language to target language. Maintain functionality, follow target language idioms, and preserve comments. Include migration notes.

media_conversion_default.preamble: Convert media files to specified format with appropriate quality settings. Optimize for target platform, maintain aspect ratios, and preserve metadata where applicable.
